name: Notion Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Notion subagent capabilities including page management, database operations, block content, and search. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: search for page about project roadmap
items.expected_output: Search Notion for pages/databases matching 'project roadmap'.

items.input: create page called 'Meeting Notes' in workspace
items.expected_output: Create new Notion page with title 'Meeting Notes'.

items.input: add paragraph to page about sprint planning
items.expected_output: 1. Search for sprint planning page. 2. Add paragraph block to page.

items.input: get page content for Q4 Goals
items.expected_output: 1. Search for Q4 Goals page. 2. Fetch block contents.

items.input: list all databases
items.expected_output: Fetch Notion data filtered for databases only.

items.input: query database Tasks for items with Status = 'In Progress'
items.expected_output: 1. Find Tasks database. 2. Query database with filter for Status property.

items.input: add row to Projects database with name 'New Feature'
items.expected_output: 1. Find Projects database. 2. Create database row with Name property.
items.context: User wants to add db entry

items.input: update page title to 'Updated Meeting Notes'
items.expected_output: 1. Find Meeting Notes page. 2. Update page properties with new title.

items.input: add heading 'Introduction' to my document
items.expected_output: 1. Find document page. 2. Add heading_1 block with text 'Introduction'.

items.input: get database schema for CRM
items.expected_output: 1. Find CRM database. 2. Fetch database to get properties/schema.

items.input: add todo list to page
items.expected_output: 1. Find or identify page. 2. Add to_do blocks to page.

items.input: get comments on the planning page
items.expected_output: 1. Find planning page. 2. Fetch comments for page.

items.input: create database called 'Bug Tracker'
items.expected_output: Create new database with title 'Bug Tracker' and default properties.

items.input: add code block with Python snippet
items.expected_output: Add code block to page with language set to Python.

items.input: search notin for budget
items.expected_output: 1. Recognize 'notin' as typo for 'notion'. 2. Search for 'budget' in Notion.

items.input: get about me info
items.expected_output: Get current user/bot information.

items.input: add bullet list with three items
items.expected_output: Add multiple bulleted_list_item blocks to page.

items.input: fetch row from database where Name is 'Project Alpha'
items.expected_output: 1. Find database. 2. Query with filter for Name. 3. Fetch row details.

items.input: archive the old notes page
items.expected_output: 1. Find old notes page. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Archive/delete page.
items.context: User wants to archive - needs consent

items.input: add callout block with important note
items.expected_output: Add callout block to page with specified content.
